sentences.sContent: He and his wife live in North Carolina, where he is a psychiatrist.
sentences.sContent_eng: He and his wife live in North Carolina, where he is a psychiatrist.
sentences.sCn: 他和妻子住在卡罗莱纳州北部，他是一名精神病医生。

sentences.sContent: “The notion that behavior modification can bring about true happiness is as bogus as can be,” says psychiatrist Charles Goodstein, MD, of New York University.
sentences.sContent_eng: “The notion that behavior modification can bring about true happiness is as bogus as can be,” says psychiatrist Charles Goodstein, MD, of New York University.
sentences.sCn: 纽约大学医学博士、精神病学家查尔斯.古德斯坦说：“行为修正能够带来真正的快乐的观念是相当虚假的。”

synos.tran: [心理][内科]精神病学家，精神病医生

words.tran: 精神的；心灵的；灵魂的；超自然的
精神病学的；精神病治疗的
影响心理状态的；作用于精神的
精神分析的；心理分析的
精神病治疗的；精神病学的
精神病学；精神病治疗法

trans.tranCn: 精神病学家，精神病医生
trans.tranOther: a doctor trained in the treatment of mental illness
